name: PayBondhu
title: PAY BONDHU – Digital Wallet Platform
description: A modern, secure, and scalable digital wallet platform with multi-role access (Admin, Agent, User), wallet management, transactions, and JWT authentication.
longDescription: PayBondhu is a full-stack digital wallet system built with Express.js, TypeScript, MongoDB, and React. It supports multiple roles like Admin, Agent, and User, providing seamless wallet management, money transfers, cash-in, and cash-out functionalities. The platform uses JWT authentication, role-based authorization, and secured APIs for better data protection.

name: Used Cars Mart
title: USED CARS MART – Buy or Sell Used Cars
description: A complete platform for buying and selling used cars with role-based access for sellers, buyers, and admins.
longDescription: USED CARS MART is a full-featured car marketplace platform that allows users to buy, sell, and manage cars easily. Sellers can create and manage listings with detailed descriptions, buyers can track purchase orders and delivery status, and admins can oversee all activities with full control. Built with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and JWT, it ensures security, performance, and a seamless experience.
features: Sellers: Add and manage car listings
Buyers: View and manage purchase orders
Admin: Manage sellers, buyers, and platform activities

name: Perform Tracker
title: PERFORM TRACKER – Track and Evaluate Company Performance
description: A comprehensive platform to manage employees, clients, teams, projects, and tasks with dedicated dashboards for Admins, Employees, and Clients.
longDescription: PERFORM TRACKER is a collaborative performance tracking system designed to monitor, manage, and evaluate company activities effectively. It provides dedicated dashboards for Admins, Employees, and Clients, making it easier to manage employees, projects, teams, tasks, and payroll. I contributed to several core features, including Employee Profiles, Projects, Teams, Payroll, Blogs, Pricing Plans, Auth State Management, and Dynamic Dashboards. Built using React, Redux, Firebase, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, the platform delivers a seamless, real-time experience with responsive UI and secure authentication.
features: Admin Dashboard: Manage employees, clients, teams, projects, and tasks
Employee Dashboard: Personal projects, profiles, and performance tracking
Client Dashboard: Project/task tracking, profile management, and activity insights
Auth state management with secure role-based access
Blogs, pricing plans, and dynamic homepage features
